original_text: Why not? Because they pursued it not by faith but as if it were by works. They stumbled over the stumbling stone.
korean_text: 어찌 그러하냐 이는 그들이 믿음을 의지하지 않고 행위를 의지함이라 부딪칠 돌에 부딪쳤느니라

sentences.original_text: Because they pursued it not by faith
but as if it were by works
They stumbled over the stumbling stone
